NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_STATUS_GET_INT', nagi.AP_STATUS) apStatusName , nagi.AP_DATE apDate , nagi.AP_GET_TYPE apGetType , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_TYPE', nagi.AP_GET_TYPE) NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_AMOUNT_RANGE', nagi.AP_GET_AMOUNT_RANGE, 7, nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE) apGetAmountRangeUseCostSecType , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_AMOUNT_RANGE', nagi.AP_GET_AMOUNT_RANGE, 10, nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE) apGetAmountRangeUseLineType , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_AMOUNT_RANGE', nagi.AP_GET_AMOUNT_RANGE, 12, nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE) apGetAmountRangeUseCostType , nagi.SPECIAL_APPROVE_FLAG specialApproveFlag , nagi.SPECIAL_APPROVE_DATE specialApproveDate , nagi.AP_CREATE_STAFF_CODE apCreateStaffCode , apCreateCompanyName , nagi.AP_CREATE_SECTION_CODE apCreateSectionCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_section_name_f(nagi.AP_CREATE_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.AP_CREATE_SECTION_CODE, nagi.AP_CREATE_SECTION_YEAR) apCreateSectionName , nagi.AP_CREATE_SECTION_YEAR apCreateSectionYear , nagi.AP_STAFF_CODE apStaffCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_staff_name_f(nagi.AP_STAFF_CODE) apStaffName , nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE nagi.AP_SECTION_YEAR) apSectionName , nagi.AP_SECTION_YEAR apSectionYear , nagi.AP_TEL apTel , nagi.AP_SKIP_APPROVE_FLAG apSkipApproveFlag , nagi.AP_NEED_CIO_JUDGE_FLAG apNeedCioJudgeFlag , nagi.AST_GET_TIME_FLAG astGetTimeFlag , nagi.AST_NAME astName , nagi.AST_CLOUD_TYPE astCloudType , nagi.AST_GROUP_CODE astGroupCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_item_group_name_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.AST_GROUP_CODE) astGroupName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.AST_GET_REASON, #enterChar#) astGetReason , nagi.AST_COMPLETE_PLAN_DATE astCompletePlanDate , nagi.AST_EFFECT_TYPE astEffectType , nagi.AST_EFFECT_AMOUNT astEffectAmount , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.AST_EFFECT_DESCRIPTION, #enterChar#) astEffectDescription , nagi.AST_RENT_FLAG astRentFlag , nagi.AST_RENT_APPLICATION_ID astRentApplicationId , nagi.AST_RENT_MONTH astRentMonth , nagi.AST_RENT_DATE_FROM astRentDateFrom , nagi.AST_RENT_DATE_TO astRentDateTo , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.AST_RENT_DESCRIPTION, NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_CATEGORY', nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE) mktCatCategoryName , nagi.MKT_CAT_TASK_CODE mktCatTaskCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_TASK', nagi.MKT_CAT_TASK_CODE) mktCatTaskName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_TASK', nagi.MKT_CAT_TASK_CODE, 2) mktProfEstFlag , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_CATEGORY', nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE, 3) mktDevNextPlanDateFlag , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_CATEGORY', nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE, 4) mktDevSchLineEditFlag1 , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_CATEGORY', nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE, 5) mktDevSchLineEditFlag2 , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_CATEGORY', nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE, 6) nagi.MKT_CAT_CATEGORY_CODE, 13) mktDevSchLineEditFlag10 , nagi.MKT_AST_PROJECT_CODE mktAstProjectCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_name_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.MKT_AST_PROJECT_CODE) mktAstProductOutline , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.MKT_AST_MARKET, #enterChar#) mktAstMarket , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.MKT_AST_POLICY, #enterChar#) mktAstPolicy , nagi.MKT_DEV_NEXT_PLAN_DATE mktDevNextPlanDate , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.ATT_DESCRIPTION, #enterChar#) attDescription , nagi.HOL_COMPANY_CODE holCompanyCode , costDepPrjCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_name_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.COST_DEP_PRJ_CODE) costDepPrjName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_type_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.COST_DEP_PRJ_CODE) costDepPrjType , nagi.COST_COMPANY_CODE costCompanyCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_company_name_f(nagi.COST_COMPANY_CODE) costCompanyName , nagi.COST_SECTION_CODE costSectionCode , nagi.COST_SECTION_YEAR costSectionYear , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cost_section_name_f(nagi.COST_SECTION_CODE, nagi.COST_SECTION_YEAR) costSectionName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.DESCRIPTION_AP, #enterChar#) descriptionAp , NEA_UTIL_PKG.replace_enter_f(nagi.DESCRIPTION_ADMIN, #enterChar#) descriptionAdmin , nagi.REPORT_COMPLETE_FLAG reportCompleteFlag , nagi.REMINDER_DATE reminderDate , nagi.APPROVE_DATE approveDate , nagi.ACTIVE_FLAG activeFlag , nagi.VER_UP_COLUMN_NAME verUpColumnName , nagi.VER_UP_TYPE verUpType
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
, NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_tel_f(nagi.AP_CREATE_COMPANY_CODE, nagi.AP_CREATE_STAFF_CODE, nagi.AP_CREATE_SECTION_YEAR) apCreateTel FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT nagi WHERE
nagi.APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId#
AND nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion#
AND nagi.ACTIVE_FLAG = '1'
nagi.EAPP_ID = #eappId#
FOR UPDATE

SELECT fld.APPLICATION_ID applicationId , fld.APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , fld.LINE_SEQ lineSeq , fld.CREATE_DATE createDate , fld.CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , fld.UPDATE_DATE updateDate , fld.UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE astCategoryCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_CATEGORY', fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE) astCategoryName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_CATEGORY', fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE, 2) astCategoryType , fld.AST_TERM_FLAG astTermFlag , fld.AST_TERM_YEAR astTermYear , fld.AST_NAME astName , fld.AST_PRJ_CODE astPrjCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_name_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, fld.AST_PRJ_CODE) astPrjName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_type_f(nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE, fld.AST_PRJ_CODE) astPrjType , fld.AST_PUR_COMPANY_CODE astPurCompanyCode , fld.AST_PUR_COMPANY_NAME astPurCompanyName , fld.AST_ESTIMATE_NUMBER astEstimateNumber , fld.AST_UNIT_AMOUNT astUnitAmount , fld.AST_QUANTITY astQuantity , fld.AST_GET_AMOUNT astGetAmount , fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE astAddUpType , DECODE(fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE, '1', '1', '0') astAddUpType1Flag , DECODE(fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE, '2', '1', '0') astAddUpType2Flag , fld.AST_COMMENT astComment , fld.AST_ACCOUNT_CODE astAccountCode , NVL(NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_ACCOUNT', fld.AST_ACCOUNT_CODE, nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE), '') astAccountName FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_FLD fld , NEA_AP_GET_INT nagi WHERE fld.APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND fld.APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# AND fld.APPLICATION_ID = nagi.APPLICATION_ID AND fld.APPLICATION_VERSION = nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION ORDER BY LINE_SEQ

SELECT APPLICATION_ID applicationId , APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , LINE_SEQ lineSeq , CREATE_DATE createDate , CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , UPDATE_DATE updateDate , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , DEV_PERIOD_FROM devPeriodFrom , DEV_PERIOD_TO devPeriodTo , (DEV_PROPER_COUNT + DEV_ENTRUST_COUNT) totalPeopleCount , DEV_PROPER_COUNT devProperCount , DEV_ENTRUST_COUNT devEntrustCount , DEV_AMOUNT devAmount , DEV_SCH_CODE devSchCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_MKT_DEV_SCH', DEV_SCH_CODE) devSchName FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_DEV_SCH WHERE APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# ORDER BY LINE_SEQ

SELECT APPLICATION_ID applicationId , APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , LINE_SEQ lineSeq , CREATE_DATE createDate , CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , UPDATE_DATE updateDate , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , OTR_COMMENT otrComment , OTR_AMOUNT otrAmount FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_OTR_COST WHERE APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# ORDER BY LINE_SEQ

SELECT APPLICATION_ID applicationId , APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , LINE_SEQ lineSeq , CREATE_DATE createDate , CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , UPDATE_DATE updateDate , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , PROF_SALES_QUANTITY profSalesQuantity , PROF_SALES_AMOUNT profSalesAmount , PROF_COST_AMOUNT profCostAmount , (PROF_SALES_AMOUNT - PROF_COST_AMOUNT) profGrossAmount FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_PROF_EST WHERE APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# ORDER BY LINE_SEQ

SELECT APPLICATION_ID applicationId , APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , LINE_SEQ lineSeq , CREATE_DATE createDate , CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.GET_STAFF_NAME_F(CREATE_STAFF_CODE) createStaffName , UPDATE_DATE updateDate , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , ATT_FILE_NAME attFileName , ATT_FILE_ID attFileId , ATT_COMMENT attComment FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_ATT WHERE APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# ORDER BY LINE_SEQ

SELECT APPLICATION_ID applicationId , APPLICATION_VERSION applicationVersion , LINE_SEQ lineSeq , CREATE_DATE createDate , CREATE_STAFF_CODE createStaffCode , UPDATE_DATE updateDate , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE updateStaffCode , COST_COMPANY_CODE costCompanyCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_company_name_f(COST_COMPANY_CODE) costCompanyName , COST_SECTION_CODE costSectionCode , COST_SECTION_YEAR costSectionYear , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cost_section_name_f(COST_SECTION_CODE, COST_SECTION_YEAR) costSectionName , COST_DIST costDist FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_COST_SEC WHERE APPLICATION_ID = #applicationId# AND APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion# ORDER BY LINE_SEQ
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT
, nabi.AST_RELEASE_DATE releaseDate , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_YN', nagi.SPECIAL_APPROVE_FLAG) specialApproveFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_YN', nagi.AP_SKIP_APPROVE_FLAG) apSkipApproveFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_YN', nagi.AP_NEED_CIO_JUDGE_FLAG) apNeedCioJudgeFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_GET_TIME', nagi.AST_GET_TIME_FLAG) astGetTimeFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('ITEM_CLOUD_TYPE', nagi.AST_CLOUD_TYPE) astCloudTypeName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_EFFECT_TYPE', nagi.AST_EFFECT_TYPE) astEffectTypeName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_YN', nagi.AST_RENT_FLAG) astRentFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('COST_TYPE', nagi.COST_TYPE) costTypeName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_REPORT', nagi.REPORT_COMPLETE_FLAG) reportCompleteFlagName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_ADD_UP_TYPE', (CASE (SELECT max(LINE_SEQ) FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_FLD WHERE APPLICATION_ID = nagi.APPLICATION_ID AND APPLICATION_VERSION = nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION) WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_FLD WHERE APPLICATION_ID = nagi.APPLICATION_ID AND APPLICATION_VERSION = nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION AND AST_ADD_UP_TYPE = '1') THEN '1' WHEN (SELECT count(*) FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_FLD WHERE APPLICATION_ID = nagi.APPLICATION_ID AND APPLICATION_VERSION = nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION AND AST_ADD_UP_TYPE = '2') THEN '2' ELSE '3' END) ) addUpTypeName , (SELECT count(*) FROM NEA_LICENSE WHERE GET_APPLICATION_ID = nagi.APPLICATION_ID) licenseRegistCount , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_ap_get_int_cost_sec_dist_f(nagi.APPLICATION_ID, nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION) costSectionDistName FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT nagi , NEA_AP_BGN_INT nabi WHERE nagi.APPLICATION_ID = nabi.APPLICATION_ID(+)
AND ROWNUM <= (SELECT TO_NUMBER(VALUE1) FROM NEA_CODE_NAME WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = 'MAX_SEARCH_ROW_COUNT' AND DELETE_FLAG = '0')
AND nagi.APPLICATION_ID IN ( SELECT nagi.APPLICATION_ID FROM NEA_AP_GET_INT nagi WHERE 1 = 1
AND nagi.ACTIVE_FLAG = '1'
AND nagi.AP_COMPANY_CODE = #searchParam.apCompanyCode#
AND nagi.APPLICATION_ID LIKE '%' || #searchParam.applicationId# || '%'
AND $applicationIdPluralList$
AND nagi.APPLICATION_VERSION = #applicationVersion#
AND $apStatusPluralList$
AND nagi.AP_DATE >= #searchParam.apDateFrom#
AND nagi.AP_DATE <= #searchParam.apDateTo#
AND (nagi.AP_STAFF_CODE = #searchParam.apStaffCode# OR nagi.AP_CREATE_STAFF_CODE = #searchParam.apStaffCode# OR nagi.HOL_STAFF_CODE = #searchParam.apStaffCode#)
AND $apGetTypePluralList$
AND nagi.EAPP_ID LIKE '%' || #searchParam.eappId# || '%'
AND $eappIdPluralList$
AND $reportCompleteFlagPluralList$
AND $addUpTypePluralList$
AND NEA_UTIL_PKG.to_fuzzy_f(nagi.AST_NAME) LIKE '%' || NEA_UTIL_PKG.to_fuzzy_f(#searchParam.astName#) || '%'
AND nagi.AST_CLOUD_TYPE = #searchParam.astCloudType#
AND nagi.AST_GROUP_CODE = #searchParam.astGroupCode#
AND nagi.AST_COMPLETE_PLAN_DATE >= #searchParam.astCompletePlanDateFrom#
AND nagi.AST_COMPLETE_PLAN_DATE <= #searchParam.astCompletePlanDateTo#
AND
((
nagi.REMINDER_DATE IS NULL
) OR
AND
(
nagi.REMINDER_DATE IS NOT NULL
AND nagi.REMINDER_DATE >= #searchParam.reminderDateFrom#
AND nagi.REMINDER_DATE <= #searchParam.reminderDateTo#
))
AND nagi.GET_TOTAL_AMOUNT >= #searchParam.getTotalAmountFrom#
AND nagi.GET_TOTAL_AMOUNT <= #searchParam.getTotalAmountTo#
AND nagi.SPECIAL_APPROVE_FLAG = '1'
AND nagi.COST_TYPE = #searchParam.costType#
AND nagi.COST_DEP_PRJ_CODE = #searchParam.costDepPrjCode#
AND nagi.COST_COMPANY_CODE = #searchParam.costCompanyCode#
AND nagi.COST_SECTION_CODE = #searchParam.costSectionCode#
AND nagi.COST_SECTION_YEAR = #searchParam.costSectionYear#
AND nagi.HOL_COMPANY_CODE = #searchParam.holCompanyCode#
AND nagi.HOL_SECTION_YEAR = #sectionYear#
AND $accessLevelSection$
AND $section$
AND nagi.HOL_REP_OFFICE_CODE = #searchParam.holRepOfficeCode#
AND lf.AST_CATEGORY_CODE = #searchParam.astCategoryCodeFld#
AND NEA_UTIL_PKG.to_fuzzy_f(lf.AST_NAME) LIKE '%' || NEA_UTIL_PKG.to_fuzzy_f(#searchParam.astNameFld#) || '%'
AND lf.AST_PRJ_CODE = #searchParam.astPrjCodeFld#
AND lf.AST_COMMENT LIKE '%' || #searchParam.astCommentFld# || '%'
AND (($descriptionPluralListAp$) OR ($descriptionPluralListAdmin$))
)

applicationId , applicationVersion , createDate , createStaffCode , updateDate , updateStaffCode , version , displayVersion , updateComment , eappId , apStatus , apStatusName , apDate , apGetType , apGetTypeName , apGetAmountRange , apGetAmountRangeName , apGetAmountRangeUseCostSecType , apGetAmountRangeUseLineType , apGetAmountRangeUseCostType , specialApproveFlag , specialApproveDate , apCreateStaffCode , apCreateStaffName , apCreateCompanyCode , apCreateCompanyName , apCreateSectionCode , apCreateSectionName , apCreateSectionYear , apStaffCode , apStaffName , apCompanyCode , apCompanyName , apSectionCode , apSectionName , apSectionYear , apTel , apSkipApproveFlag , apNeedCioJudgeFlag , astGetTimeFlag , astName , astCloudType , astGroupCode , astGroupName , astGetReason , astCompletePlanDate , astEffectType , astEffectAmount , astEffectDescription , astRentFlag , astRentApplicationId , astRentMonth , astRentDateFrom , astRentDateTo , astRentDescription , astTotalAmount , getTotalAmount , mktCatCategoryCode , mktCatCategoryName , mktCatTaskCode , mktCatTaskName , mktProfEstFlag , mktDevNextPlanDateFlag , mktDevSchLineEditFlag1 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag2 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag3 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag4 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag5 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag6 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag7 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag8 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag9 , mktDevSchLineEditFlag10 , mktAstProjectCode , mktAstProjectName , mktAstProjectType , mktAstProductOutline , mktAstMarket , mktAstPolicy , mktDevNextPlanDate , attDescription , holCompanyCode , holCompanyName , holSectionCode , holSectionName , holSectionYear , holStaffCode , holStaffName , holStaffCompanyCode , holStaffCompanyName , holStaffSectionCode , holStaffSectionName , holStaffSectionYear , holRepOfficeCode , holRepOfficeName , costType , costDepPrjCode , costDepPrjName , costDepPrjType , costCompanyCode , costCompanyName , costSectionCode , costSectionName , descriptionAp , descriptionAdmin , reportCompleteFlag , reminderDate , approveDate , activeFlag , verUpColumnName , verUpType , releaseDate , specialApproveFlagName , apSkipApproveFlagName , apNeedCioJudgeFlagName , astGetTimeFlagName , astCloudTypeName , astEffectTypeName , astRentFlagName , costTypeName , reportCompleteFlagName , addUpTypeName , licenseRegistCount
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
, fld.LINE_SEQ fldLineSeq , fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE fldAstCategoryCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_CATEGORY', fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE) fldAstCategoryName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_CATEGORY', fld.AST_CATEGORY_CODE, 2) fldAstCategoryType , fld.AST_TERM_FLAG fldAstTermFlag , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('FLAG_YN', fld.AST_TERM_FLAG) fldAstTermFlagName , fld.AST_TERM_YEAR fldAstTermYear , fld.AST_NAME fldAstName , fld.AST_PRJ_CODE fldAstPrjCode , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_name_f(a.apCompanyCode, fld.AST_PRJ_CODE) fldAstPrjName , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_project_type_f(a.apCompanyCode, fld.AST_PRJ_CODE) fldAstPrjType , fld.AST_PUR_COMPANY_CODE fldAstPurCompanyCode , fld.AST_PUR_COMPANY_NAME fldAstPurCompanyName , fld.AST_ESTIMATE_NUMBER fldAstEstimateNumber , fld.AST_UNIT_AMOUNT fldAstUnitAmount , fld.AST_QUANTITY fldAstQuantity , fld.AST_GET_AMOUNT fldAstGetAmount , fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE fldAstAddUpType , NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_ADD_UP_TYPE', fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE) fldAstAddUpTypeName , DECODE(fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE, '1', '1', '0') fldAstAddUpType1Flag , DECODE(fld.AST_ADD_UP_TYPE, '2', '1', '0') fldAstAddUpType2Flag , fld.AST_COMMENT fldAstComment , fld.AST_ACCOUNT_CODE fldAstAccountCode , NVL(NEA_UTIL_PKG.get_cn_value1_f('AP_GET_INT_AST_ACCOUNT', fld.AST_ACCOUNT_CODE, apCompanyCode), ' ') fldAstAccountName FROM () a , NEA_AP_GET_INT_LINE_FLD fld WHERE applicationId = fld.APPLICATION_ID(+) AND applicationVersion = fld.APPLICATION_VERSION(+) ORDER BY applicationId, applicationVersion, fldLineSeq
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NEA_AP_GET_INT ( APPLICATION_ID , APPLICATION_VERSION , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_STAFF_CODE , UPDATE_DATE , UPDATE_STAFF_CODE , VERSION , DISPLAY_VERSION , UPDATE_COMMENT ,
